mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.question_id as "questionId", d.speaker_id as "speakerId", d.listner_id as "listnerId", d.content as "content" FROM `discuss` d where 1 = 1
mapper.update: update discuss set question_id = #{questionId}, speaker_id = #{speakerId}, listner_id=#{listnerId}, content = #{content}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id=#{id}
